Amount.description: Amount holds the value of the "Amount" field.

edges.description:
Edges holds the relations/edges for other nodes in the graph.
The values are being populated by the BillQuery when eager-loading is set.

billstatus.description: Billstatus holds the value of the billstatus edge.

payments.description: Payments holds the value of the payments edge.

resident.description: Resident holds the value of the resident edge.
